attributes.action: sequential monarch numbering regardless of name
attributes.additional_details: There is much controversy on the number assigned to monarchs of GB&I, e.g. is our current queen Elizabeth the first or GB&I or the second if we consider Elizabeth the first queen of England. To avoid this potential source of division among our nations I propose a sequential numbering from the first monarch rather than a number by name. Our next monarch will be Charles 61st to be followed by William 62nd.
